attributes.action: Legalise the sale and use of cannabis to people over the age of 21
attributes.additional_details:
In previous petitions it has been said that cannabis is a dangerous drug and can harm health, yet this was with no solid evidence.

I

Drinking alcohol is far worse as it alters mind in a usually negative way.

Users of cannabis would say that they feel relaxed, productive and hungry at worse!

Serious discussion needs to be had 
Any talk about it being harmful is contradicted by the current sales of alcohol and tobacco which gives people an invevitable death of cancer.
attributes.background: Have another debate (After Brexit) about the legalisation and sale of cannabis in the UK
